text: Tracks and platforms is a railway station on the Osaka Metro Midosuji Line in Yodogawa-ku, Osaka, Japan. It also serves as an interchange for Minamikata Station on the Hankyu Railway Kyoto Line. ==Connecting line from Nishinakajima-Minamigata== *Hankyu Kyoto Line (Minamikata Station) ==Station layout== The station has two elevated side platforms. ==Adjacent stations== ==External links== Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1964 Category:Osaka Metro stations
title: Nishinakajima-Minamigata Station
